body:
@soumith this only seems to be a problem for the cudnn version if I understand correctly?

I can send a PR if no one is working on this. 

I think I just need to add 
```C++
THVoidTensor_assertContiguous(input);
``` 
to the `cudnn_batch_norm_forward` function and a 

```C++
THVoidTensor_assertContiguous(input); 
THVoidTensor_assertContiguous(grad_output)
```
to `cudnn_batch_norm_backward`
